EmailTemplate.name: 201907_Global_BK_Channel_Newsletter_MC.201907_Global_BK_Channel_Newsletter_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Dealer Newsletter July 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
BendixKing Channel Newsletter | July 2019 <[[http://www.bendixKing.com]]> Dear Valued Channel Partners,
BendixKing is pleased to announce the following Supplemental Type Certificates (STC’s):
- AeroVue Touch <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue-touch]]> flight display for part 23 class I and II aircraft. - KA 310 autopilot adapter for the already Technical Standard Ordered AeroFlight <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight]]> (KI 300) attitude indicator. - AeroCruze 230 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230]]> autopilot designed to upgrade existing KFC 150 installations.
More information on the initial STC’s can be found in the sales bulletins <[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Sales-Bulletins]]> or downloaded in Honeywell Tech Pubs at https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/ <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>.
To get updates on your Channel Partner goals and/or COOP earnings, please email Lamonte.Macon@bendixking.com <[[mailto:Lamonte.Macon@bendixking.com]]> or contact your area sales manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
For technical support please call 855-250-7027 and for new product images in support of your new product sales, please visit our media gallery <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/pages/media-gallery]]>.
We are excited to bring you new certified products and look forward to supporting your sales efforts.
Successful selling everyone!
